description:
-Tweaked vocals and some notations so they're easier on the eyes
-Added staccatos where they belong since Songsterr allows for that now
-Removed 6-string parts only because they drown out the other instruments in the mix. I'll make a 6-string tab of this
title: Here to Stay

description:
Fixed some Fieldy's parts
Fixed Volumes
Fixed some vocals
title: Here to Stay

description:
Fixed some 6 string volumes
Fixed Interlude to Clean and to correct part, since in the instrumental you can hear it keeps playing under the Rhythm until the "Break it Down!"
Here's the instrumental at that part: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lB19EXomAes&t=154s&ab_channel=RandomMusic
Made Fieldy's Bass Slap Bass, since he doesn't play finger style anywhere on this song I believe.
title: Here to Stay

description:
- fixed lead. Head plays this live, and was also recorded, with octaves, not chords. The effects are Tremolo, octave and a chorus pedal
- Made 6 string version of the guitars (on Drop A)
- Added Intro octave effect (DO NOT change it to a guitar, DO NOT. Songsterr does not register tunings below 7 string C/D Standard and it will not handle -1 A2 Tuning)
But rn the tab should be perfect, unless someone wants to fix vocals... Tho they are already okay
title: Here to Stay
